title: Better Context Menus With Safe Triangles
description: Imagine the situation when you’ve hovered over a menu item that reveals another list of menu items, then tried to hover over that nested menu only to have the entire menu close on you. Is this a UX challenge you’ve struggled with? A well-known concept called the “safe triangle” solves this issue.
